data.title: Mike Herrera on LinkedIn: “Bass Player” is not a job… That’s kind of true. But it’s lead me to many…
data.meta_description:
“Bass Player” is not a job…

That’s kind of true. But it’s lead me to many opportunuties!
data.text:
More you learn the more you potentially earn? Do you agree? Training and development for me is extremely important. However, it’s only of value if implemented. What is the best way of all to learn? Apply to deVere if you’re looking an international company where there’s always opportunities to learn. Go to our website or link below #deVere #finance #financial #careers #training #jobs

4 completions today!!! Over the past few months, I have spoken to a few agents looking to go self employed and discussed eXp UK. I have every confidence they would be successful as they are brilliant agents. Some i have spoken to are joining, but some openly said, they are not 100% they have the ability to do it and thats fine. Being self employed is not easy. You do need to be committed and you do need to believe in yourself. For those people that i have spoken to, who have not joined yet, I believe in you, you have got this. Believe in yourself.

Investing heavily in software to modernize your business, but cutting corners by using generalist resources for implementation, is a recipe for disaster. Highly trained and industry-focused professionals are crucial to unlocking the full potential of any software investment and ensuring it drives real value for both your business and your brand.

The Continuous Need for New Agents Discover why new players are crucial in 'The Continuous Need for New Agents'. New agents can offer value and potential while seasoned players can be expensive and risky. Every team needs a balance of experience and fresh talent; keep playing and watching! Read today's Recruiting Insight: https://lnkd.in/gTMYjNe3
